extendedInfo.description: Over 250+ unique points of interest (POIs) throughout Zion National Park. A 45+ minute audio/auto tour, GPS-enabled/custom-made map which works WITHOUT a cell/wifi connection, daily Ranger-Led events schedule, sunrise/sunsets data for over a year, free shuttle bus schedule, 75+ photographs, 29+ hiking trail descriptions, scenic viewpoint guide, a special Safety section, and details on camping, scenic views, points of interest, restrooms, parking, picnicking, and accessibility. RICH CONTENT: + Content has been written by a professional travel writer - not copy-and-pasted from the Park Service website! + Over 75 professional photographs of park.+ Descriptions for 29 of the most popular hiking trails with the park. + Unique Safety section which details all the concerns while visiting the park. + Location and description of EVERY restroom in the park! + Location and description of EVERY parking lot in the park and Springdale area! + Location and description of EVERY picnic area lot in the park! MAPS: + NO CELL/WIFI CONNECTION REQUIRED! Download all the maps for offline usage.+ High resolution, topographic maps which you can edit!+ Carriage roads intersection labels.+ Hiking trails for the entire park.+ Interactive map annotations.Â  + GPS "where am I" function for the entire Park (does not work on non-GPS enabled devices such as the iPod Touch) Â  AUDIO/AUTO TOUR: + 45 minute audio tour by a professional voiceover artist.  + 51 points of interest located in the Zion Canyon, East Side, and Kolob Canyons.RANGER-LED EVENTS SCHEDULE: + Daily National Park Service Ranger-led events are pre-loaded and updated automatically.+ Includes the time, optional fees, accessibility, meeting location, and description. + View multiple days of events.+ Updated on a regular basis.SHUTTLE BUS SCHEDULE:* Complete FREE shuttle bus schedule.* Stop locations and times.* Simple, easy to read "Next Bus Arrives" interface.SUNRISE/SUNSET: + Sunrise and sunset data for seven of the best locations in the park.+ View any date within 365 days into the future.+ Updated on a regular basis.INTERFACE: + Universal National Park Service symbols. + Search all content within the app.+ Favorites feature.PUSH NOTIFICATIONS: + Push notifications for park-related news, alerts, and events.+ Push notifications as soon as they are available.For more details on this and other Chimani apps for the national parks, visit www.chimani.com. Be sure to follow us on Twitter at twitter.com/chimani and Facebook at www.facebook.com/chimaniAndroid Permissions Request ExplanationFor human readable explanations on why this Chimani app is requesting various permissions on your device, please refer to our privacy policy at http://www.chimani.com/privacy.html.

reviews.comment: Good app for getting intro & overview of park. Interface is great. Info from other sources.
reviews.author: Lindy Edwards

reviews.title: Air mail?
reviews.comment: The App requires it and I haven\'t been able to find it. This looks like a good app for an upcoming trip, however ....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good start!
reviews.comment: The app is an awesome idea and the trail descriptions are very helpful and detailed. In practice when using it the map would just be blank when the my location feature is used (nexus s), when zooming the map and then scrolling the zoom level was reset each time So it has a lot of potential but needs some polishing
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great resource
reviews.comment: I love these park specific apps from Chimani. Maps, information, hiking trails, events and more. Please make these for every park when you have time!
reviews.author: A Google User
